short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss out on rewards again. With the extension you’ll get rewards alerts while you shop, plus get coupons applied at checkout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Activate rewards directly from 1,000+ stores while you shop online. With the U.S. Bank Shopping Deals® browser extension you’ll:

🛍️ Get easy-to-activate reminders: The extension lets you know when to activate and earn rewards as you shop at more than 1,000 stores.

💰 Enjoy savings at your fingertips: Shop savvier with coupon codes that are automatically applied at checkout.

⚖️ Compare rewards offers: Shop and earn with confidence thanks to Google search results that clearly display stores’ rewards offers.

💯    Always get the best price: The extension comparison-shops for you, then lets you know if a product is available for the same price or less at another store that's also offering rewards. 

👀 See what else you can earn: Enjoy easy access to earning opportunities like extra rewards and more.

❤️ Let the rewards you love come to you: Get the U.S. Bank Shopping Deals® browser extension now and get rewarded every time you shop.

By installing the Shopping Deals® extension, you are agreeing to these Terms & Conditions:
https://shopping1.rewardscentermall.com/terms____.htm  

Privacy Policy: https://www.usbank.com/about-us-bank/privacy.html
